attributes.action: increase the amount of forested land on the british isles thinking big
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we have little forests covering our landscape but why well because we chopped the great forests  down now we are left with very small pockets of isolated woodland

we need the goverment to create large areas of our land into great forests bothfor  wldlife to thrive but for us to enjoy and repp the benifits as they would absorb large quantaties of carbon out of the atmospher each year
we need to think big these new forests should cover 1000's of acers each
